metadata.Plot: Casper, the friendly ghost, likes people but people are afraid of him. So Casper goes to the zoo looking for a friend, which he quickly makes with a baby elephant, and, together, they go out playing in the night. The mother elephant finds him missing and raises an alarm. Casper returns with his new friend and is allowed to remain in the elephant's cage with his new friend.
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Sid Raymond
